name: store-rating-platform
description: Store Rating Platform with separate frontend and backend deployment

scripts.build: echo 'Build completed - frontend and backend deployed separately'
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:client
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.clean: rm -rf client/build && rm -rf backend/node_modules && rm -rf client/node_modules
